entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 04:00 AM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
